#summary Installation description of WAFO Toolbox Version 2.5 beta.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Install instructions =

 0. Make a directory where you want wafo to reside, eg: c:\wafo25

 1. Binary download the file [http://wafo.googlecode.com/files/wafo_2.5_beta.7z wafo-2.5_beta.7z]. You will be asked for the destination/directory of the compressed file. 

 2. Uncompress the zip-file to the WAFO directory (c:\wafo25), by means of 7-zip. 7-zip  can be download from http://www.7-zip.org/.

 3. Edit the file startup.m and give a path to the WAFO toolbox by adding the command "addpath('c:\wafo25')".. 

 4. Start Matlab and type 'initwafo' at the matlab prompt. Try 'help wafo'.
